app.title: Moon Calendar
app.introduction: Are you looking for a simple moon calendar? Then you have found it! With this web app you can generate your personal moon calendar, not only with moon phases, but also with special events related to the moon. The moon calendar can be viewed below and exported to your calendar as an iCalendar (ICS) file or downloaded and printed as a PDF file.

fromTo.date: Date format needs to be YYYY-MM-DD.
fromTo.minmax: Date needs to be between the year 1000 and 3000.

ical.downloadWarning: You can download many calendar entries here. If you don't like the moon calendar, you will have to delete each individual entry manually - depending on the calendar app. It is better to subscribe to the calendar.

subscribe.title: Subscribe to iCalendar Feed

instructions.lead: Choose your calendar program to see a short guide

iOS.name: iOS
steps: Tap on "Calendar", then "Accounts", "Add Account", "Other", "Add Calendar subscription"

googleCalendar.name: Google Calendar
steps: Tap on the "+" after "More calendars", then on "From URL"

instructions.androidIntro: Android displays calendar entries from Google Calendar, so you can:
instructions.androidIfNotAutomatic: If the calendar is not automatically displayed on your cell phone:
androidExtraSteps: Click on the icon at the top left to open the sidebar, then click on "Settings"

thunderbird.name: Thunderbird
steps: Enter the link below under "Address" and select "This address does not require login details"
Tap on "Search calendar" and then on "Subscribe"

outlook.name: Outlook
steps: Enter the link below and a calendar name like "Mooncal"

instructions.enjoyInstruction: Enjoy your new calendar entries and

subscribe.explanations: With this link all selected events will be shown for the previous half year and for the following two years.

about.title: About this site
about.introduction: The aim of this project is to provide a simple and neat moon calendar for everyone. The data is calculated and collected from various sources to the best of one''s knowledge and belief.

support.title: Do you want to support this project?

thank.title: Support
thank.introduction: This moon calendar is free and ad-free. To ensure that it stays that way, it is dependent on support, because the required infrastructure, further development and maintenance cost money. I would be very happy about support, a coffee or more.

review.title: Review of funding
review.pleaseHelp: Help me never have to go without coffee this year!

improveTranslation.title: Do you have a suggestion for a better translation?
improveTranslation.lead: Is something not yet translated correctly, does something sound strange?

fromTo.tolargefordaily: When selecting daily phases only {0} years can be displayed.
